alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 11:15PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, ASCENSION, NORTHWESTERN ST. JAMES, SOUTH CENTRAL LIVINGSTON, SOUTHEASTERN IBERVILLE AND ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CST... At 1115 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plaquemine to near Sorrel. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Napoleonville, St. Gabriel, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, Paincourtville, Geismar, Convent, Supreme, Bayou Sorrel, Carville, and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
